abstract: Stock market experiences large declines as investors respond to steep drop in oil prices and jump in value of dollar, capping third week of declines.
lead_paragraph: Utilities, major exporters and companies that make basic materials like steel had the biggest declines.

headline.main: More Volatility Sends Market Down for a 3rd Week
headline.print_headline: More Volatility Sends Market Down for a 3rd Week

snippet: Utilities, major exporters and companies that make basic materials like steel had the biggest declines.
